subject: Hello ,,
body:
Hello ,,
Merry Christmas to you . 
Please confirm to me when I should 
Posted your loaded and activated card which is still with me throughout the Christmas.
I looks forward for your reply.
Regards,
Sonji Blatte

subject: Re:  Hello ,,
body:
Hello Sonji Blatte,

Merry Christmas to you too! I hope you're having a wonderful holiday season. 

I'm not quite sure what you mean by "loaded and activated card". Could you please provide more details about this? I'd love to help in any way I can.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
